job.title: Software Engineer / Node / 100% Remote
job.industry: Computer Software,Information Services,Information Technology and Services
job.description: <p>We are Actively seeking a Software Engineer/Node to join our team on a permanent basis. In this position you will work on SCRUM team that is creating APIs written as microservices via NodeJS as AWS Lambda functions within a serverless architecture.&nbsp;We offer 100% remote work, 100% paid health care, 401K with Match, Bonus, and an excellent opportunity for advancement.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Desired Skills</p><p>&nbsp;</p><ul><li>3+ years of Software Engineering experience</li><li>Proficiency in JavaScript and TypeScript running on Node.js</li><li>Ability to create APIs written as microservices via NodeJS as AWS Lambda functions within a serverless architecture</li><li>Strong experience with SQL, MySQL or NoSQL database design and implementation?</li><li>Strong understanding of building and using REST APIs</li><li>Interest in moving into API architecture and design</li><li>Experience working in an agile development environment with remote team members</li></ul><p></p>
